Service Details: Showers: Men, women and families: 10:00am - 11:45am and 3:30pm - 4:45pm (first come, first served)Laundry: Please come to the Mission and make an appointmentDrop-in Barber: During weekdays from 10:00am - noon (when volunteer barber is available; please phone for the barber's hours)
Eligibility: Minors must be accompanied by their guardian
